thread.section_title: Eagle Optics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Eagle Optics | www.eagleoptics.com
thread.title: John Sokel
thread.title_full: Eagle Optics reviewed by John Sokel

author: John Sokel
title: John Sokel
text: There is a dizzying array of options for buying binoculars, and as a simple backyard bird watcher, I was a little lost as to why some are $100 and some are $2500. Eagle has a great section on their site that describes all the different specs and classifications to help choosing the right pair for you. Highly recommend them.
